def_cn: 巨大的；特大的；极其重要的
def_en: Something that is described as giant is much larger or more important than most others of its kind.
Giant is often used to refer to any large, successful business organization or country.

def_cn: （尤指古代传说中虚构的）巨人
def_en: A giant is an imaginary person who is very big and strong, especially one mentioned in old stories.

def_cn: 伟人；巨子；高大健壮的人
def_en: You can refer to someone, especially a man, as a giant, if they seem important or powerful or if they are big and strong.

def_cn: 卓越人物；大师；才华超群的人
def_en: You can refer to someone such as a famous musician or writer as a giant, if they are regarded as one of the most important or successful people in their field.
